name: Verify packages when I have more than one

testSteps.description: 1: Verify packages when I have more than one ({cedula=5729155, type=CC, screenAlternativasMessage='Así puedes unificar tus créditos'})

children.description:
Given the session is started with user and type of document
| cedula | type |
| 5729155 | CC |
crico@bancolombia.com.co opens the Bancolombia cobranza digital
When I have more than one package to unify
And I enter to know more alternatives
